text: Power FM (ACMA call sign: 5EZY) is a contemporary hit radio-formatted commercial radio station based in Murray Bridge, South Australia. Broadcasting on 98.7FM, the station has repeaters at Victor Harbor on 99.7FM and in the Adelaide Hills on 100.3FM. ==Key Contacts== * Stephen Walker, General Manager * Mel Dee, Program Director * Chris Dzelde, Music Director ==References== ==External links== * Website Category:Radio stations in South Australia Category:Contemporary hit radio stations in Australia Category:Grant Broadcasters
title: Power FM (South Australia)
